definition: future events/and what happened next... (in fiction)/funeral arrangements
don't forget past events, they can guide you in future (idiom); benefit from past experience
pinyin: qian2 shi4 bu4 wang4 , hou4 shi4 zhi1 shi1

sentences.english: What may count for more is that Mr Castro is increasingly preoccupied by his legacy.
sentences.chinese: 更重要的是卡斯特罗越来越关心他的身后事。

sentences.english: I think you have to prepare for his funeral.
sentences.chinese: 我看你赶快准备后事吧。

sentences.english: The two sides will keep close contacts and cooperation to appropriately handle the aftermath.
sentences.chinese: 双方表示将就妥善处理善后事宜保持密切联系与合作。

sentences.english: The Japanese agreed to Mr Kim back to gold mother do chores.
sentences.chinese: 日军同意金戈回金家为金母办后事。

sentences.english: Fourthly, the works of rescue injured and rehabilitation dead people were done with all our strength.
sentences.chinese: 四是全力做好受伤人员抢救和遇难人员善后事宜。

sentences.english: He needed to come home immediately and take care of things.
sentences.chinese: 他觉得自己需要马上回家，处理父亲的身后事。

sentences.english: So, dad with Grandpa went to the northeast, grandma's funeral treatment.
sentences.chinese: 因此，爸爸陪爷爷去了一趟东北，处理奶奶的后事。

sentences.english: The old man is look beyond the grave.
Just finished doing cuckoldry funeral affairs, and then lost a kid, leisurely lay ten thousand Ji of reading to fear tos.
sentences.chinese: 刚刚办完妻子的后事，又失去了孩子，悠介万念惧寂。

sentences.english: If you want to know what happened afterwards, read the next chapter.
sentences.chinese: 欲知后事如何，且听下回分解。

sentences.english: For those with relatively straightforward affairs this can look like a cheap option.
sentences.chinese: 对于相对简单的后事，这是一个较为便宜的选择。

sentences.english: Now I just hope I can make the funeral arrangements.
sentences.chinese: 很伤心，但也没办法，现在只希望帮儿子办好后事。

sentences.english: Clinton looked puzzled and asked why such a young person was concerned about where he would be buried.
sentences.chinese: 克林顿十分不解，问他为什么这么年轻就想到了后事。

sentences.english: I asked for three days' leave to arrange my father's funeral affairs.
sentences.chinese: 我请了三天的丧假来处理父亲的后事。

sentences.english: The doctors told his family to dig his grave.
sentences.chinese: 医生叫他的家人准备后事。

sentences.english: Cash for last expenses and or taxes.
sentences.chinese: 后事费用及税收所需的现金。

definition: restrain your grief, accept fate (condolence phrase)
(of an organization that has a duty of care) to give financial support to relatives of sb who has died or suffered serious injury
to hasten home for the funeral of a parent or grandparent
a funeral/to encoffin a corpse/to carry to burial
future days/(literary) the next day/(old) past days
to announce sb's demise/to predict death
